General.Name: Paisalo Digital Limited
General.Description: Paisalo Digital Limited, a non-banking financial company, provides financial products in India. The company offers business loans, SME and MSME loans, and income generation loans for business/self-employment purpose; mobility loan for auto rickshaw, electric rickshaw, tempo, and two wheelers; and entrepreneurial loan for entrepreneurs and small business owners. The company was formerly known as S. E. Investments Limited and changed its name to Paisalo Digital Limited in January 2018. Paisalo Digital Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Agra, India.
